mapper.select: SELECT s.id ,s.date ,s.start ,s.end ,SUBTIME(s.end,s.start) AS work_time ,s.created_at ,s.updated_at ,s.employee_id ,e.name FROM test_shifts_and_time_records AS s INNER JOIN test_employees AS e ON s.employee_id = e.id WHERE MONTH(s.date) = #{targetMonth} ORDER BY s.date ASC ;

SELECT s.id ,s.date ,s.start ,s.end ,SUBTIME(s.end,s.start) AS work_time ,s.created_at ,s.updated_at ,s.employee_id ,e.name FROM test_shifts_and_time_records AS s INNER JOIN test_employees e ON s.employee_id=e.id WHERE MONTH(s.date) = #{targetMonth} AND s.employee_id = #{employeeId} ;
SELECT DISTINCT e.id ,e.name FROM test_shifts_and_time_records s INNER JOIN test_employees e ON s.employee_id = e.id WHERE MONTH(s.date) = #{targetMonth} ;
SELECT s.id ,s.date ,s.start ,s.end ,s.employee_id ,e.name FROM test_shifts_and_time_records AS s INNER JOIN test_employees AS e ON s.employee_id = e.id WHERE s.id = #{shiftId} ;
